Uses of Package
com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.image

  • Packages that use com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.image 
    Package Description
    com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.image  
    com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.pixel  
    com.defano.jmonet.canvas  
    com.defano.jmonet.tools  
    com.defano.jmonet.tools.selection  
  • Classes in com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.image used by com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.image 
    Class and Description
    ImageTransform
    A transform that can be applied to a BufferedImage as a whole, like rotate, flip, and scale operations.
    PixelTransform
    A transform that can be applied to an individual pixel, like invert, or brightness adjustment.
    StaticImageTransform
    A transformation that can be applied to a BufferedImage as a whole, but which does not modify the dimensions of the image (like color reduction or fill).
    StaticImageTransformable
    An image-containing object that can be transformed by a StaticImageTransform; that is, all the pixels of the image may be transformed, but the dimensions or bounds of the image can not.
  • Classes in com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.image used by com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.pixel 
    Class and Description
    PixelTransform
    A transform that can be applied to an individual pixel, like invert, or brightness adjustment.
  • Classes in com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.image used by com.defano.jmonet.canvas 
    Class and Description
    PixelTransform
    A transform that can be applied to an individual pixel, like invert, or brightness adjustment.
    StaticImageTransform
    A transformation that can be applied to a BufferedImage as a whole, but which does not modify the dimensions of the image (like color reduction or fill).
    StaticImageTransformable
    An image-containing object that can be transformed by a StaticImageTransform; that is, all the pixels of the image may be transformed, but the dimensions or bounds of the image can not.
    Transformable
    An image-containing object whose image can be transformed by a StaticImageTransform.
  • Classes in com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.image used by com.defano.jmonet.tools 
    Class and Description
    StaticImageTransformable
    An image-containing object that can be transformed by a StaticImageTransform; that is, all the pixels of the image may be transformed, but the dimensions or bounds of the image can not.
    Transformable
    An image-containing object whose image can be transformed by a StaticImageTransform.
  • Classes in com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.image used by com.defano.jmonet.tools.selection 
    Class and Description
    PixelTransform
    A transform that can be applied to an individual pixel, like invert, or brightness adjustment.
    StaticImageTransform
    A transformation that can be applied to a BufferedImage as a whole, but which does not modify the dimensions of the image (like color reduction or fill).
    StaticImageTransformable
    An image-containing object that can be transformed by a StaticImageTransform; that is, all the pixels of the image may be transformed, but the dimensions or bounds of the image can not.
    Transformable
